Welcome to the world of MixARS! üåç‚ú®The Mixed Reality software developed by ARS Book, the first Italian 4.0 publishing house, which is revolutionizing learning in Italian schools. With MixARS, learning becomes an immersive, inclusive and surprising experience!
More than 50 educational contents for three disciplines: science, geometry and geography.

The strengths of MixARS are numerous: the perpetual license guarantees unlimited access to the software, furthermore, MixARS works offline, allowing you to use the program even without an internet connection.

What are the advantages for teachers and students?
For pupils, MixARS offers a simpler and more effective way to learn complex content in science, geometry and geography subjects. Thanks to the possibility of interacting with three-dimensional objects and carrying out numerous activities, students can explore abstract concepts in a practical and engaging way.
For teachers, MixARS is a powerful tool to engage students and make learning more inspiring. The ability to view three-dimensional objects, explore virtual scenarios and create personalized activities allows teachers to offer innovative teaching adapted to the needs of each student.

Recommended age: 13+
Explore new ways of Learning with MixARS and discover how technology can become a tool to make complex topics more accessible and fascinating.
